sentences.en: Alien 2 : I hate these puny undersized planets.
sentences.cn: 外星人 2: 我讨厌这些小不点的星球.

sentences.en: And twenty of these puny lies I'll tell.
sentences.cn: 这种毫无价值的瞎话要多少我都可以造出来.

sentences.en: Antonio was a puny lad, and not strong enough to work.
sentences.cn: 安东尼奥是个瘦小的小家伙, 身体还不壮,还不能干活.

sentences.en: Beyond diplomatic measures, South Korea's retaliatory options are puny - and dangerous.
sentences.cn: 除了外交手段之外, 韩国能够选择的报复手段都收效不大,并且很危险.

sentences.en: Don't pit your puny wit against my massive intelligence.
sentences.cn: 不要拿你的小聪明来对付我高深的智慧.

sentences.en: Have grandiose aims but puny abilities, great ambition but little talent.
sentences.cn: 眼高手低, 志大才疏.

sentences.en: Once there was a puny little concert violinist named Rudolf, who lived in Sweden.
sentences.cn: 从前在瑞典,有一身材瘦弱矮小的小提琴手, 名叫鲁道夫.

sentences.en: Puny and sorry as those lives were, they much resembled his own.
sentences.cn: 它们的生命是那样渺小,那样可怜, 和他自己的非常相似.

sentences.en: Puny though he looked, he was as brave as a lion.
sentences.cn: 虽然他看上去弱小, 但却十分勇敢.

sentences.en: Some doctors are pretty puny characters.
sentences.cn: 医生中也不乏庸庸碌碌之辈.

sentences.en: That's the way with you whining , puny, pitiful players.
sentences.cn: 你们这种又爱哭 、 又软弱 、 又可怜的赌棍就是这样.

sentences.en: The lamb was a puny little thing.
The men had huge bulging heads and puny bodies.
sentences.cn: 这些人有一颗硕大的头颅和瘦小的身子.

sentences.en: You are a mere puny mortal , and I care nothing for you.
sentences.cn: 玩家在游戏中是渺小的, 我漠不关心.

trans.tran_cn: 小于一般尺寸的，微不足道的，弱小的，微弱的
trans.tran_en: a puny person is small, thin, and weak
